reference.description: Yulin had solid knowledge and experience on networking technologies which he leveraged for system level validation of Ethernet related IP blocks in AMCC PowerPC 4xx SoC. I had good time to work with him. He was good team player and showed his dedication to getting the job done right.

I worked with Yulin on the same project at Broadcom. Yulin has strong background in networking protocols and extensive experience in HW debugging, He provided lots of constructive input during product testing and debugging. He is proactive and shows a can-do attitude all the time.  Yulin is willing to offer help whenever you ask for it.

recommender.headline: Global Director, HW Engineering at HGST, a Western Digital company
recommender.summary: A result oriented achiever with proven success, hands-on experience in leading multiple HW Product platform teams across the globe. Global Director of Engineering with over 22 years of diverse experience in Product design and development of Enterprise Storage products (SATA, SAS, NVMe SSDs), Semiconductor (PowerPC Processors), Telecom (framer/Mapper 10G/40G/100G) and Reprographic products (Scanner, Plotters).
recommender.location: 美国 加利福尼亚州 橘县

reference.description: Yulin is a fine person and is a Team Player. I had the Pleasure of working with Yulin at AMCC. He has sound and indepth knowledge in Networking and has brought to AMCC key validation strategies that has helped us to find critial bugs. He is a  is a fast learner and at AMCC he was involved in processor System Validation with key focus on System flows over Linux, RAID5/6 engines Memory Queues and DDR2. He has a thorough dedication and commitment to his Job and his coworkers. He will be an asset for anyone he works for. I strongly recommend Yulin to anyone who is considering him.

recommender.headline: Director of Engineering at Lattice Semiconductor
recommender.summary:
•	Engineering and Management: 18 years in systems and IC design of wireless communications and parallel computation systems.
•	Strength built from experiences: New technology exploration in startup environment. Analytical problem solving. Design of complicated systems with hardware and software integration.

reference.description:
Yulin is a very dedicated engineer, inspiring, quick-learning and team playing. I worked together with Yulin on IC and system validation of wired and wireless LAN products at Broadcom for over 3 years, including the first introduction of the integrated 11g AP switching router. Yulin's contribution was instrumental and he demonstrated on the job with good testing automation skills in programming and scripting, good domain knowledge in communications protocol, and solid understanding of IC and system implementations.
Rong Zeng, Manager, HW Engineering, Broadcom/Allayer (1998-2005)
managed Yulin indirectly at Broadcom

recommender.headline: Sr. Principal Engineer at Broadcom
recommender.summary:
Lead verification engineer for a variety of advanced chip design projects - 10G Optical PHY, DSP/Read-Channel, Network Processor/SOC, Ethernet Switching ASIC, and MIPS CPU. Extensive experience in methodology definition, front-end design and verification environment setup, verification tool development, silicon bring-up & debug, and managing verification resource and schedule with numerous silicons in volume production and generating large revenues.

Specialties: Design Verification Lead for 10G PHY, DSP, CPU, Network Processors and ASIC/SOC.

pastPositions.title: Sr. Staff Engineer
pastPositions.displayText: Maverick Networks (acquired by Broadcom) - Sr. Staff Engineer

positions.title: Sr. Staff Engineer
positions.displayText: Maverick Networks (acquired by Broadcom) - Sr. Staff Engineer

reference.description: Yulin was instrumental in setting up the RTL emulation environment for a 16-port Gigabit Ethernet Switch project, and also found design bugs in time for the tapeout. He is dependable and hard-working. It was a pleasure working with Yulin.

position.title: Lead HW Validation and Test Engineer
position.summary:
•	Setup lab from ground up, order equipment, coordinate environmental and EMC tests.
•	Develop HW validation plan and factory functional test plan.
•	Bring up board, perform measurements and compliance tests on interfaces.
position.displayText: NIO - Lead HW Validation and Test Engineer

position.title: Senior Hardware Validation Engineer
position.summary:
•	Brought up systems, debugged and validated various interfaces: USB 2/3, HDMI 1.4b/2.0, SATA 2/3, DDR3, Composite/component video, Ethernet, I2C/SPI, etc.  Performed timing and power analysis, solved various problems with vendors, worked with Tektronix to improve their features and solve their problems, traveled to chip vendors to get issues resolved.
•	Led HW validation for new project from power on to design and interfaces validation.
position.displayText: Verizon Labs - Senior Hardware Validation Engineer

position.title: Lead Hardware Validation Engineer
position.summary:
Responsible for network security product NPI testing and support.
•	Defined requirements for product qualification, performed HW tests/qualification for products of both stand-alone boxes and blades in chassis, developed test strategies, wrote test scripts, debugged problems. 
•	Proactively worked on cross-discipline issues, being the lead/owner to tackle difficult problems, travelled overseas to fix issues at CM.

position.title: Hardware System Validation/Test consultant
position.summary:
•	Led system bring-up efforts and tests for consumer electronics and enterprise storage systems.
•	 Debugged various issues from battery to interfaces and devices, wrote tests in C/bash for memory and various interface testing.
position.displayText: Consulting Roles - Hardware System Validation/Test consultant

position.title: Staff validation engineer
position.summary:
Responsible for test and validation of  PowerPC based microprocessor series.  

Tested the chip Ethernet interfaces, PCI/PCIe NIC card interfaces, used the scripts to test chip vectors, bootup, data flow, high-bandwidth/low latency buses; used C-based test framework with Linux kernel module to test the RAID5/6 XOR feature. 
Won "Thanks-A-Million" award for outstanding performance in finding bugs and completing project in time for aggressive schedule.

position.title: Senior Hardware Engineer
position.summary:
Work as Validation engineer for wireless LAN MAC layer

Use and tweak the firmware SW to configure the chips, used logic analyzer/oscilloscope to debug/verify the design, used sniffer for system level testing and protocol checking.

position.title: Senior staff validation engineer
position.summary:
Responsible for system validation/test of 1G/10G Ethernet switch products and 802.11g wireless LAN with 5 port 100 BaseT switch.

Built the wireless LAN test environment for 11g plus Ethernet switch chip, performed hardware debugging and testing for 11g compliance, wrote and performed automated tests with scripts in Tcl and using GPIB interfacing with test equipments.
Developed test strategies, test automation framework and wrote automated tests in Tcl to test the switches in system level with IXIA/SmartBit for several swittch chips in different architecture, finished every project on time and delivered test reports for application/customers.
Worked with vendor's application engineers to bring up emulation system for a 16/24 port gigabit Ethernet switch, wrote the interface between chip design and emulation interface in Verilog, validated Broadcom proprietary WebSmart software.
Visited oversea customers to help resolve chip issues, conducted competitive studies for marketing, helped application engineers on customer issues on regular basis.

position.title: Staff Test Engineer
position.summary:
Responsible for developing hardware functional tests for metro optical network system.

Led hardware test development for new electronic data/management boards of ONI's metro optical network system, developed a complete automated test suite, designed test strategies, test coverage on functionalities and captured into pseudo codes, worked with SW engineer to deliver a test station with automated tests.
Led a group of test engineers in charge of testing all the electrical features on all the boards for the company's metro optical switching system, oversaw the technical transfer to contracted manufacturers, installed test equipment and test suite in the OEM's sites, supplied technical support for them.  
Built test stations for the complete test suite testing, including DCA (Data Communication Analyzer), Oscilloscope, multimeter, switching unit, DBM, and optical instruments.
Developed training sessions and classes for testing staff and trained new engineers.
position.displayText: ONI Systems, Inc - Staff Test Engineer

position.title: Product Development Engineer
position.summary:
Responsible for chip development after tape-out.

Worked with system engineers to characterize, validate and test network controllers/switches using SmartBit and IXIA, manually tested all the features of the chips.  Wrote Perl programs to convert test patterns for Burn-In tests, and used Perl for results analysis.
Oversee the product development from after design to production in the role of product engineer for several chips, including project management, and test board development.

profile.headline: Lead HW Validation/Test Engineer For ADAS
profile.summary:
A continuous learner with passion for innovation, detail oriented and self-disciplined, with strong teamwork skills through effective communication and inherent leadership.  An excellent engineer in HW validation and system test from design to production, with understanding of both HW and FW disciplines.
•	10+ year experience in HW validation and system test, developing test strategies and automated solutions, detailed knowledge of system bring-up from components to board manufacturing, trouble-shooting bugs involving both HW and SW.
•	Hands-on experience with various interfaces: PCIe, USB 2/3, HDMI 1.4/2.0, DDR3, SATA 2/3, MIPI, BroadR-Reach, Ethernet, I2C/SPI/CAN, etc.  
•	Extensive experience ranging from lab setup, on-site customer support, internal training and dealing with oversea customers and CM’s.
